Verses.20: Therefore, we are ambassadors for Christ. Just as if God were making an appeal through us. We beg you, on behalf of Christ: "Be reconciled to God!"
Verses.21: He made Him, who did not know sin, to be sin on our behalf. So that in Him we might become the righteousness of God.
